hero.title: Beautifully Remodeled Home
hero.subtitle: Prime Cul-de-Sac Location in The Woodlands

summary.heading: Beautifully Remodeled Home in The Woodlands ? Prime Cul-de-Sac Location
summary.description: Welcome to this stunning one-story, 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 2-car garage home in one of the most desirable neighborhoods of The Woodlands. Situated on a peaceful cul-de-sac, this home has been completely remodeled inside and out with modern updates that blend style, comfort, and efficiency.

highlights.title: Energy-efficient upgrades
highlights.description: Brand new roof (installation scheduled for November 5, 2025), new Carrier HVAC system with premium C8 ductwork, Simonton insulated windows, and LP Smart Siding installed over new OSB decking.

highlights.title: Electrical and lighting updates
highlights.description: New upgraded electrical panel, stylish lighting fixtures, modern switches, and ceiling fans throughout.

highlights.title: Beautiful interior finishes
highlights.description: Inviting living room with new fireplace doors and a custom-stained mantel, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

highlights.title: Modern kitchen
highlights.description: Fully renovated with new appliances, updated lighting, and a layout designed for family gatherings and entertaining.

highlights.title: Spacious backyard
highlights.description: Large, newly fenced yard?perfect for kids, pets, and outdoor relaxation?with easy access through new patio doors.

summary.footer: You'll appreciate the thoughtful attention to detail and the move-in-ready quality of this home. Come see for yourself why this property is the perfect place to create lasting memories with your family.
summary.note:
?? More photos coming soon, featuring the new roof and recent landscaping updates.
?? Open house to be announced soon!
